author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO STRENGTHENS AS IT PASSES NEAR SOCORRO ISLAND...
summary: ...MARIO STRENGTHENS AS IT PASSES NEAR SOCORRO ISLAND... As of 2:00 PM MST Sun Sep 14 the center of Mario was located near 18.9, -110.7 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO STRENGTHENS AS IT PASSES NEAR SOCORRO ISLAND... As of 2:00 PM MST Sun Sep 14 the center of Mario was located near 18.9, -110.7 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
